author: Adam Pribila
title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee Donates to Cancer Patient After Mocking Him for ‘Nazi Hair’
text:
Full Frontal with Samantha Bee Donates to Cancer Patient After Mocking Him for ‘Nazi Hair’ by Adam Pribila | 4:08 pm, March 9th, 2017 
In one of the cable news show’s less shining moment, Wednesday saw Full Frontal with Samantha Bee correspondent Michael Rubens mocking a CPAC attendee for his supposed choice of hairstyle. 
“This year, the bow ties were gone, replaced by Nazi hair, Nazi hair, Nazi hair…” the corresponded said in the segment showing images of young attendees with partially shaved heads. 
In actuality, one of the men pictured was Kyle Coddington , who is suffering from stage 4 glioblastoma, a very aggressive form of brain cancer. 
The TBS show posted an apology on Twitter, though, not long after a backlash began. We deeply apologize for offending @_that_kyle in our CPAC segment. We only learned of his condition today & have removed him from the piece. 
— Full Frontal (@FullFrontalSamB) March 9, 2017 
Going a step further, a donation was made in the name of the TBS show to Coddington’s GoFundMe page , where he is hoping to raise funds to cover his growing medical expenses. 
At the time of writing this, Full Frontal with Samantha Bee is listed as the “Largest Donor,” with a donation of $1000, with the note “We wish you the best, Kyle!” added. 
Since the uproar with Bee last night there have been upwards of 30 donations to Coddington’s page.
